text.$invariant:
Automating your sectional door with an Automatic Technology opener not only makes entering and exiting your home easier, but it also ensures the safety and security of your family and pets. With features like smartphone control you can monitor who comes and goes from your property from anywhere in the world.

What sets Automatic Technology sectional door openers apart?

contentData.heading: Saving you time
contentData.description: Automating your sectional door makes entering and exiting your home a breeze, saving you time and effort.

contentData.heading: Easy to install
contentData.description: The installation of Automatic Technology sectional door openers is made simple and reliable, and they can be counted on to lift and lower your garage door for many years to come.

contentData.heading: Prevent unwanted entry
contentData.description: The Automatic back drive feature prevents unwanted entry by forcing the door back down if an intruder is trying to lift it.

contentData.heading: In-built auto-reversing
contentData.description: Automatic Technology sectional door openers feature in-built automatic reversing smarts, which detect and reverse the door's direction if an obstruction is detected. This ensures the safety of your family and pets.

contentData.heading: In-built safety reminders
contentData.description: Automatic Technology openers have in-built audio and visual reminders when they require servicing, just like your car, to maintain their performance and ensure ongoing safety.

contentData.heading: Stress tested & durable
contentData.description: Soft start and stop technology reduces stress on the opener, allowing the door to open and close quickly and quietly for years, not just when it's installed.

contentData.heading: Remote access
contentData.description: With features such as remote access and smartphone operation, you can control who has access to your garage from anywhere in the world.

contentData.heading: Convenient & Reliable
contentData.description: Choose Automatic Technology sectional door openers to ensure the safety and security of your property, while enjoying the convenience and reliability of automatic door operation.
